definitions.definition: A period of time consisting of one thousand years .
The period of one thousand years during which Christ will reign on earth (according to Millenarianist interpretations).
examples: The Nazis' concept for the so-called Thousand-Year Reich of their infallible Leader has been described as but a pale pseudoreligious false-prophet imitation of the Christian concept of the millennium of Christ regnant.

definitions.definition: A long era of universal happiness, peace , and prosperity.
The year in which one period of one thousand years ends and another begins, especially the year 2000.
examples: A huge fireworks display was put on in Sydney to celebrate the millennium .

main_definition: ( countable ) A period of time consisting of one thousand years .
secondary_definitions: ( Christianity ) The period of one thousand years during which Christ will reign on earth (according to Millenarianist interpretations).
( archaic ) A long era of universal happiness, peace , and prosperity.
( with definite article ) The year in which one period of one thousand years ends and another begins, especially the year 2000.
